official_title: A concurrent resolution to pay tribute to the American Veterans of World War II on the 40th anniversary of V-E Day.

summary.text: Expresses, on the 40th anniversary of V-E Day, the sense of the Congress concerning the Nation's deep gratitude toward and recognition of the enormous debt owed to the American servicemen who fought in World War II.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to pay tribute to the American Veterans of World War II on the 40th anniversary of V-E Day.
